data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martin, Joel W., Wall, Adam R., Shank, Tim, Cha, Harim, Seid, Charlotte A., Rouse, Greg W. (2018): A new species of Alvinocaris (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea: Alvinocarididae) from Costa Rican methane seeps. Zootaxa 4504 (3): 418-430, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4504.3.7|2 occurrences
